ygData.subject: Re: Unfair?
ygData.msgSnippet: On Tue, 27 Apr 1999 10:43:20 -0500 John Penman  ... Nah. I ve regained my concentration (in very few instances) before. ... skeizer
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 27 Apr 1999 10:43:20 -0500 "John Penman" <jpenman@...>

> Well I think they have taken some of this in to consideration
> because it
> seems they added somehting new to last nights patch. During the
> game last
> night I received a message while in combat taht stated "You regained
> concentration" and it cast my spells after it told me I lost
> concentration.
> Could be the first steps...? Who knows.

Nah. I've regained my concentration (in very few instances) before.

---
skeizer (the gnome)
